title: Stacking  per-day IP Boosts
body: If I bought two 30-day boosts, I would have 60 days, right?

replies.body:
Hello Oblivionpill!

The simple answer to your question is:  Yes!

:D

Per day and per boosts stack on top of each other.

It's double stacking time.

Wait.... That name. Oblivion Pill. Sounds OP, and dangerous. Nerf??
